Release date: May 30, 2013 
Genre: Racing 
Developer: Stainless Games Ltd 
Format:. Apk, cache 
Version: 1.1.270 
Language: English 

System requirements:
==========================
 
OS Version: Android 2.3 +; Processor Type: ARMv6, ARMv7
 


Carmageddon - Great racing action game with PC and Mac finally made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹it to our Android devices. Super game, it contains a lot of effects, and the most amazing is that in a game full freedom of action, here you play as you wish! Your opponents in the game - it's a bunch of frostbitten crazies who are riding on the super cool cars with powerful weapons on board. You are on your car to destroy everything in its path, destroying all his rivals, earning combos and various bonuses. But do not forget that the streets are safe guarded and patrolled by no less brutal police in armored wheelbarrows that you can equalize the ground. In the game you are waiting for twenty eight opponents crazy, eleven media for a ride, a career mode in which thirty six levels, tons of humor and fun, it will delay you for hours ...

Setting:
========================== 

1) Copy com.stainlessgames.carmageddon folder to sdcard / Android / obb 

2) Install APK 

3) Play!
